overview:
Xavier Lange is a software programmer living in San Diego. He studied Computer Engineering at the University of Illinois where he focused on security and hardware. Throughout school he worked on commercial web applications with a focus on the human resources. His work has been featured on large-scale dating websites (including a big one out of Canada), hospitality consultancies, and medium-sized retail outfits.

He is currently working on the mass-market commercialization of this technology and experience while enjoying the surf and sun of San Diego.
